sentence.Network_en: The stillness of night was broken by the boom of a cannon.
sentence.Network_cn: 夜晚的寂静被隆隆的炮声打破。

sentence.Network_en: Four deafening explosions shattered the stillness of the night air.
sentence.Network_cn: 四起震耳欲聋的爆炸声打破了夜空的寂静。

sentence.Network_en: The sound of footsteps on the path broke the stillness.
sentence.Network_cn: 小路上的脚步声打破了宁静。

Sentence.sentence: Thirst grows for living unplugged More people are taking breaks from the connected life amid the stillness and quiet of retreats like the Jesuit Center in Wernersville, Pennsylvania
he began, was stillness and quiet
The author takes walks and reads and loses himself in the stillness of the hermitage so that he can bring his wife and bosses and friends around him anthing valuable.

sentences.en: There was a sudden stillness in the air.
The stillness of the fields was broken by the sound of a gunshot.
sentences.cn: 一声枪声打破了田野的寂静。
